three pounds so one bag of grain spawn 30 production blocks about 90 pounds 60 to 90 pounds of mushrooms or we can just keep expanding and turn this into 10 bags of grain spawn and 300 blocks and yeah just keep going really there's no stopping the mycelium it's always hungry so everything that gets inoculated straight from the peachy dish is a G1 generation one that means it's the first transfer away from the plate and then if I use this to grain to grain which is a common term it means transferring grains to new grains that would be a generation two and I really like to stay out around generation two I don't like to go past it I go and past it you can further the risk of basically just like a weaker strain less vigor and maybe even more of a chance of contamination just until recently I just did some experiments and I found that just depending on what size of the vessel I'm using I can kind of add in the moisture and the dry ingredients all at once and depending on like if
